name: Penida Colada Beach Bar
address: Jl. Ped-Buyuk, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
types: restaurant, brunch_restaurant, cafe, seafood_restaurant, event_venue, bar, food
review 1:
The place is very pleasant, with excellent service, food, and drinks, and there may be live music (check times). The atmosphere is a bit more energetic when there's a live show. I found it very suitable for anyone looking for a place to eat, drink, or just have fun because it's frequented by foreigners, and there are people in the same vibe looking to share with others.
Overall, my experiences at this place have been very good, and I would definitely come back if I visit the island again.
review 2:
after having a terrible lunch at Warung Beach restaurant, we were very afraid to try out this place just next to it

Plus I had bookmarked this place for their Octopus

I spoke to their staff first and she seemed to have a good idea on how the octopus is prepared and that i will probably like it
we took the risk and ordered the same along with spaghetti

Food was great!!!

My first octopus experience was fantastic.. lovely creature to have on a dinner plate
Staff and the atmosphere is lovely plus live music.. this place is a great option for dinner and clearly in the top 2 in our Penida trip
3J48BKL
review 3: We were there for breakfast. Our favourites were the Easy Tropical or Sunset Immunity for smoothies and the coffees are good too! For mains, Eggs Benedict and Chef‚Äôs Omelette were delicious. Wartika took great care of us, frequently checking in on us (asking if we enjoyed our meals), thank you!
review 4: Stayed nearby and had lunch or a happy hour snack nearly every day after diving. Impressed by the friendly, competent service, and the food was great. Several nights of live music too. Latin night on Thursday, and music on Friday nights too were popular and fun. Highly recommended Penida Colada if you find yourself on Nusa Penida.
review 5: Very lovely vibes, great live music, kind staff. 3 dips apetizer seemed a little bit too simple and small for 80k dish. Fried banana desert was heaven. I was surprised for snickers ice cream pop that in restaurant they serve ice cream on sticks. But I was warned before. We would come again to try some other foods because atmosphere was great here.

name: Coco Penida Restaurant & Bar
address: Jalan Ped - Buyuk, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
AMAZING! Had late lunch here. We had the oven baked fish and mi goreng. Both delicious. The fish was incredible.
It was so good that we came back for dinner a few hours later and essentially ate the same things again. And left nothing on the plate ü§£ the grilled octopus salad is also nice.
Super relaxing music (we came on a day without live music). Very comfy chairs and bean bags. Highly recommend.
review 2:
Visited this charming spot recently and was absolutely taken away by the breathtaking beach views it offers.

The ambiance is elevated by the thoughtful lighting that creates a warm and inviting atmosphere, making every moment spent here truly magical.

The highlight, however, has to be the authentic Indonesian cuisine that tantalizes the taste buds with its rich flavors and perfectly balanced spices.

Every dish we tried was a delightful journey into traditional Indonesian culinary excellence. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking to enjoy great food with a stunning seaside backdrop.
review 3: It‚Äôs a good place to dine in with decent vegetarian options on the menu. We had ordered few drinks along with food and although everything was satisfactory the food just missed to hit the mark . The staff is super friendly and polite and attentive.
review 4:
We were here few times and food was always of high standard. Lava cake desert was just sensational and since we tried it we got addicted and kept on returning for more. We also had our Christmas dinner here and food was just great. The restaurant atmosphere is very nice,  being located ovelooking  the sea.

If I could sugest one area of improvemnent I might review and refrest slightly the selection of coctails.
review 5: Great views with the soothing sound of waves crashing. 5 star service - very helpful and friendly. Took care of our luggage so that we could relax and have our breakfast. Yummy toast and breakfast bowl, highly recommend it

name: Singabu Sand Beach
address: Ped, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Almost perfect! Affordable price for food compared to other nearby beach clubs in Penida. Food was ok, but could be improved.. Very good atmosphere, numerous seating strategically designed and located for sunset. Nice waiters too. And very spacious parking. Whoever build this business truly has a taste and careful consideration for architecture and practicality.. Just need to improve food and all will be perfect üëå
review 2: by me, it is the best one! delicious food, last night I invited friends for dinner, multicultural meeting (Muslims, hindu, Christians) and you know what? it was  about people, not politicians! staff is amazing and they prepared an excellent goodbye evening for us. and also thank you for your last words been told us! Hopefully see you soon again!!! üôèüèª
review 3: Food was very nice. The staff was also very good, happy and friendly. We spent 2 nights for dinner as they have live music every night which was enjoyable. Good for sunset. Good value for money
review 4:
Really happy that we were able to experience this place as well as their food! Ughhhh! So good! Brilliant place and staff! Indeed a must visit place here in Nusa Penida! Couldn‚Äôt ask for more!

Thank you for an amazing service and beautiful vibes!
review 5: Wonderful restaurant, with live music, super attentive staff!! We were on a very special date and they were so kind to us! I will come back for sure

name: Next Level Cafe
address: Bodong Nusa penida, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
So yummy! The best part is that their fruits are refrigerated so smoothie bowls and juices are served cold üòä

Prices are great! Ordered 2 juices, 2 smoothie bowls and 1 egg avo toast for 250k.

View is magnificent.
review 2:
Best place ever for breakfast/brunch in Nusa Penida.
I went several mornings during my stay in Nusa Penida, always good, very nice environment, friendly staff, fair prices.
Really enjoyed and highly recommend it.
review 3: Awesome place! Just becareful asking for vegan or vegetarian. Shrimp crackers might appear, we asked because we were confused and they confirmed it was shrimp. If you don‚Äôt eat animals, and don‚Äôt want to see dead sea animals on your plate, please ask them about shrimp crackers before placing your order! Not the first place on Nusa Penida, many people think shrimp crackers are vegetarian. Killing ocean animals is NOT vegetarian. Lucky a friend was happy to take and eat the shrimp crackers. Photos are: tofu wrap and vege mee goreng! 100% rate the 2 chilli spicy level! If you love Nepalese spicy, or Sri Lankan spicy, or Chinese spicy, or Thai spicy, or Korean spicy, get the 2 chilli spicy! Mie Goreng is yummy! Loved the potato wedges as well :):)
review 4:
Had an early dinner here and ordered the nasi goreng for starters and the Mexican tacos as mains. (My friend had the seafood marinara pasta and the taco's) All the food tasted nice. The goreng tasted different from all the nasi goreng's I've ever had, but not a bad change. The taco's were by far the highlight of the dine experience here, highly recommend those!

The cocktails on the other hand were poorly made and the margaritas were just tequila and weird tasting lime juice. No triple sec or cointreau present. The mojito tasted like it was missing some flavour, yet the rum punch was definitely present. In bar presence they can definitely grow significantly.
review 5:
My wife and I ordered the Crispy Calimary and the fish and chips appetizers.  The Calimary was not good and we did not eat
We mention to the staff but they say no it is good. They charge me for it anyways even though I complained. The fish and chips was poor. The B&B Poke Bowl, the chicken Saute were very good. The smoothie was good too. I do not think we will go back. A few steps away is much better with a much better atmosphere.

The Calimary did not taste fresh and was like a rubber band. Not tender and succulent. It had a funny taste.

name: Sushi island
address: 8GF5+VXR, Jalan, Buyuk, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Possibly the best sushi we have ever had! We have spent hundreds of dollars before and it doesn‚Äôt compare to this! We had a really disappointing meal at a local high end restaurant and came here to eat the best and freshest sushi we have ever had for a third of the price. Do yourself a favour! You must come here!
We returned for lunch because it was so good. There servings a really generous and they are so well priced. Thanks for having us SI.
review 2:
Amazing! One of a few places we‚Äôve gone back the next day for the food!

Impressive sushi, good value for the price and fast kitchen ;)
Service was pleasant and they had these lovely dogs and cat to keep you company.

10/10 would recommend
review 3:
I definitely recommend sushi over here.
The fish is fresh and the quality is there.
We paid around 35‚Ç¨ for a couple.
Careful so you don't "over order" like we did üò¢
review 4:
Penida's restaurants are almost all on this side of the island, and this is one of the best!

It has just been renovated. Simple and pleasant decor. The staff is perfect and the service fast. Dogs and cats also love the place.

The best is the food. Excellent ! And at a very reasonable price. Everything is delicious and we can't wait to try everything.

We had a Miso soup. A delight.
A sushi Nigiri platter, a large dish of simply wonderful sushi.
But also a chicken katsu curry ramen and ‚Ä¶Gyoza. You have to try those Gyoza! Simply the best.

And, all this, for 302,000 Rp.
Quick quick, we're going back !!!
Are you coming ?
review 5: If come to Nusa Penida you MUST to try this sushi. The best in the Island, the family y just lovely. They have two beautiful dogs and you have to know they are around and they deserves be there cus are super cute. The flavors and the size are super nice and the price is the best. Super fresh and tasty experience ü§ç

name: Warung beach
address: 8GF6+MRM, Jalan, Buyuk, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
I had the morning glory with rice, tempeh satay and coconut. I usually love morning glory and this one did not disappoint.

The best part was‚Ä¶ the owner offered to drive me back home since I did not plan for a way to get back to my villa after dark (silly me). So I hopped on the back of his scooter and we had a nice little chat. This was the first time I ever got on a scooter and this will forever stay in my memory üòÇüíú thank you again so much for the delicious food and the ride.
review 2:
Pak Wayan and Staff in the kitchen so kind, so welcome..‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

The food was amazing with adorable price..‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

And also for the best beach view‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
review 3: SO so good! We kept coming back for more (we love food and trying new dishes and very rarely go back to the same place twice)! Satay is so good! All the tempeh dishes are great! Juices and smoothies so good. Freshly cooked pita bread also so good that I asked to have one as a side!
review 4: The best food on the island. Very cosy atmosphere, friendly owners. The homemade food tastes insane. Portions are generous and prices are low compared to other places in the area. I recommend eating here
review 5: Simple Restaurant with a lovely family. Food was so good that we came twice. I can recommend the Chicken Satayüòç prices are fair and cheap.

name: NOM√â BEACH CLUB & Restaurant Nusa Penida
address: Jl. Ped Desa Tanah Bias, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali, Indonesia
types: restaurant, coffee_shop, cafe, swimming_pool, night_club, sports_complex, bar, store, food
review 1: Had a wonderful day here!! Perfect place to relax after diving stayed here all day for lunch and dinner even in the evening had some cocktails!! Whenever I‚Äôm at nusa penida I would recommend everyone this place!! Also my kids got the snorkeling gear for free, there is a really nice place in front of nome beach ‚Ä¶Tip of the day take the quesadillasüòçüòçüòç
review 2:
Relaxing and pretty settings. The staff are incredible and very warm, friendly and funny.
Spaghetti Bolognese and the Chicken Parmagiana were good.
The ambience was superb, and great for an afternoon chill-out.
review 3:
Came here for dinner with some friends, nice place but very unsatisfied about the food. It was good but very ‚Äúlittle‚Äù portion.
We took fish and chips them and I took a burger, which came with fries as well.
Well, both the kind of dishes had this ridiculous amount of fries. It wasn‚Äôt a big deal, I asked the waiter if it wasn‚Äôt little for the dish and he said that that was the standard portion. So, from this my review. Good food, insignificant portions.
Here a pic to make u understand what I mean (and it was the same amount for the FISH AND CHIPS, that it should be like half of the plate)
review 4: The atmosphere is really great, relaxing after a long ride. The food is pretty good. Got beach view
review 5:
Whatta Find! Great spot in Ped area Nusa Penida Island.

November 2023

Happened to be staying close to Nome Beach day club while in Nusa Penida Island . Stopped in for food/drinks. We came both in a day and nite time, Stunning setting, beautiful ambience and view, but completely undersells how exquisite the site is. Disappointed we hadn‚Äôt known of the place when we came to this island before. Great live music performance and continue with the DJ set. Service was excellent & attentive, food delicious, and the cocktails were very reasonably priced and well made. Thanks a bunch and good luck to Mr. Jefry as General Manager and all the team members for the heartfelt service and hospitality sense. Will be back soon!! Highly recommend.

name: Ring Sameton Resort Hotel
address: Jalan Raya Ped-Buyuk, Br. Bodong, Ped,, Nusa Penida Island, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: We had a wonderful one-night stay. The lady kindly allowed us to check in at 10:00 AM, giving us plenty of time to explore Nusa Penida. They helped us order food in the evening. The property features a beautiful pool and is surrounded by banana and coconut trees. Highly recommended.
review 2: Overall this hotel was great for us. The ladies who run it are so kind üôèüèº the rooms are decent. Clean and very big. The shower isn‚Äôt the best, definitely needs updating. We could only get 1 warm shower at a time. We had to wait 20 minutes after each other to have warm water again. But otherwise, our stay was great. The pool was nice, decent breakfast options, and very accommodating women.
review 3: Perfect place to chill after a hard day‚Äôs diving. Generously sized rooms with large bathrooms and hot shower. Excellent WiFi throughout the resort. Big warm swimming pool, great garden setting and close to dive Centers and restaurants. And the best - the unfailing friendliness of our hostesses, we felt like family. They also organised a perfect driver for us to explore the island. Big hugs and big thank yous.
review 4: I stayed here as a part of a diving package with Pure Dive for several days.  The staff at the front desk were very kind and friendly.  The bed and pillows were great.  My criticism is that the refrigerator in my room had not been cleaned in a while, but luckily, I did not need to use it.  Having lived in several developing countries, I have a fear and aversion to open drains in my room for obvious reasons.  I placed the trash cans over each of the drains (shower and bathroom). There were very large windows, which made the room very bright, but they had not been cleaned in a while.  They had a very nice pool.
review 5: We spent 4 nights at Ring Sameton and enjoyed our stay. It was close to the diving shop we dive with which was convenient and also close to many good restaurants. The first room we stayed in had an issue with the AC unit but after they weren't able to quickly fix it they moved our room. The beds were comfortable and the bathroom clean. The staff was all very friendly and helpful when we needed it. The included breakfast was plentiful and cooked to order. The pool was also very nice and clean. I would highly recommend a stay at Ring Sameton Hotel!

name: Tishe Yoga & Body Movement Studio & Cafe
address: 8GF6+J4J, Ped, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
types: cafe, fitness_center, sports_complex, gym, health, food
review 1: Super cute and serene yoga place in the middle of the jungle of Nusa Penida. I did a Hatha flow class and stayed afterwards for a coffee and lunch. A really lovely vibe, sweet people and the food (I had the avocado sourdough toast with feta) and oatcappucino are delicious!
review 2: An amazing yoga studio! We were visiting Nusa Penida and searched online for a studio and found this one. When we arrived, they had changed the schedule and there was no class planned. Instead of asking us to wait- they provided us with an amazing Hatha Yoga class! It was a beautiful setting and a knowledgeable teacher. Highly recommend!
review 3: We took a yoga class (Vinyasa flow) there and had breakfast. We liked both. The place is super cute and it feels like you are in the middle of the jungle. Very peaceful. We would definitely come back. :)
review 4:
This is truly one of the most wonderful yoga studios and cafes I have ever visited. The vibe is so serene, relaxing and peaceful. Aside from some of the most well-crafted and beautifully presented food in all of Penida, it‚Äôs easy to tell the place is cared for with a LOT of love. I‚Äôve spoken to the owner of the studio a lot and it‚Äôs clear that she put so much time, care and attention into creating this magical place. The staff here are also amazing. So sweet, so kind and so talented. Thank you for your amazing service.

Also, the quality of teaching and the teachers who share their gifts here are absolutely amazing. I had one of the most transformative practices of my life with Egor @yegor_yogaflame and my body felt stronger and more relaxed ever since. That was after just ONE class!! Definitely worth a visit! I really hope they start offering Ecstatic Dance Penida, because the space would be perfect for it.
review 5: Beautiful Yoga-Shala and caf√© in the forest, great yoga, good coffee and nice breakfast-bowls

name: Warung Camole
address: 8GG4+9V8, Ped, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Finally found a local warung serving real indonesian food at very reasonable prices!

Portions are generous, food is fresh and tastes great. Wish I'd found Warung Camole and their down-to-earth friendly staff and cooking before my last night on the island. I would have eaten every meal here :)
review 2: We ate in this family restaurant yesterday the food was really, good we took the satay chicken and the chicken burger the service was really nice if we have to comeback in nusa penida we will be really happy to come again üôè
review 3: A must visit for great local food and local prices.
review 4: Omg! Best fried dumplins / wantons we ever had. I dont know how they do them, but they dont feel fried, they feel tosted in a oven. So so so good. Totally recommend. Takes long time but enjoy and relax ;)
review 5: We tried to eat here lunch but it was closed, next we tried dinner and success :-) food was  good, not like a rocket just simple clean and cheap. This combination works well and we were so sad that we didnt find it earlier..

name: Penida Minang beach
address: Ped, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Very good service .ü§©
Beautiful place üòá
The food is delicious and all types of food are availableü•∞
review 2:
Finally big enough portions (Mie Goreng).
The milkshake is a bit small for 50k though.
Very nice spot right by the sea.
Super polite staff.
review 3: Great place to have food with friends. Friendly service and dishes for reasonable prices. Try their Pizza Hawaii and one of the delicious desserts.
review 4: fantastic view and ambiance. quick service. ample parking. the food was fine; not bad, not amazing. it seems their specialty is alcoholic cocktails, which we didn‚Äôt have but would seem to be a good place to spend the day. worth a shot.
review 5: quiet place with live music. The food portion is big and nice.

name: Warung Pondok
address: 8GF7+H4M, Ped, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: A local and cozy fish restaurant (warung) with direct nice sea view. Super fresh fish and seafood. Each dish was perfectly balanced with spices. The owner catches the fish every day by himself or gets it by some friends. They speak English so it was easy to get in contact with them and we also got good recommendations for our stay in Nusa Penida. The staff was super friendly and the prices are more than fair! We enjoyed the atmosphere so much so we came three times in a row for lunch/dinner. In this warung we enjoyed to get in touch with kind and heart warming people we heart Nusa Penida Island standing for.
review 2:
This place needs more traffic... Food is good, price is reasonable. But when we were there for dinner, no one else was around. Everyone was at one of the western joints.
Do give this place a try for lunch or dinner when around the area
review 3:
We visited this local warung during our diving course breaks.

I'm vegetarian so unfortunately there weren't many meal options for me. My son enjoyed their fried calamari. My husband and daughter ate their nasi goreng. There would be the occasional added protein in the form of a fried bug with the nasi ;)

The view and staff are lovely!
review 4:
This warung placed in front of Pure Dive Center. Nice taste of balinese foods. My favorite is sambel matah. Combined with any fish to taste good.
We can directly view of the beach. We can see great Agung Mountain from the beach.
We can see a lot off small fisherman boat across the sea.
review 5:
Overall review: food was average, price is similar to beach club nearby. Not worth the price. Misleading price tag on google menu

We ordered grilled fish of the day, garlic prawn with rice and calamari rings with chips.

The ‚Äúgrilled‚Äù fish actually taste pretty good. I ordered grilled fish but it turned out to be a steamed fish rather than a grilled fish. Price was around 95k for 400g of fish. 7/10

My partner had garlic prawn with rice. The prawns were pathetically small. One of the smallest prawns that I have eaten after so long in Bali since most restaurants serve decently huge prawns.

Calamari rings were quite bad as it was small and somewhat under-fried. However the fries were decently good.

Spent approx 350k with the food above including 2 watermelon juices. We had to go to other warung for supper as the portions were too little as compared to other warungs.

name: VnS Beachfront Guesthouse
address: Jl. Ped - Buyuk, Ped, Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: We had an amazing stay here, there are only 2 rooms (to my knowledge) that sleep 2 people each, so it was perfect for our group of 4 as we were the only ones using the space while we were there. It has the most incredible views for sunrise, and there are also stairs leading directly into the sea for swimming. Their dog Lala is so cute and very friendly. Please take care of Lala and give her lots of pets for us if you meet her!
review 2: So, so, so good! We had the most amazing stay at this guesthouse. It has only 2 rooms and a private entrance, so you'll have a lot of privacy in a busy street. Shower, bed, filled fridge, best coral in front of house: it was amazing. The owner, Ida is lovely. She speaks English really well and invites you into her guesthouse with open arms. Her dog Lala is the cutest, she follows you to every restaurant you go to and lies by your side until you leave again.
review 3: BEWARE!! The old lady owner with gold jewellery is a scam artist. We accidentally broke one coffee mug and let her know, she said don‚Äôt worry. Then at the last minute when checking out and paying our bill for items used out of the mini bar she tried to make us pay for a whole set which included two mugs and two sauces. The new set was much better quality and adding to that we saw in her storage room that she had single replacement mugs. We agreed to pay for the mug but objected to paying for the whole set and at that point she went crazy, started calling us names, said we were crazy, said we were bad guests because we asked to have the room cleaned daily (which was a service described in the advert for the property) said that we broke her aircon because we had it on too much. She started ranting about something along the lines of ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not a rich person like you I‚Äôm not as good as you! You think you‚Äôre better than me‚Äù this was crazy behaviour. We were going to ask to leave our bags after check out but couldn‚Äôt after her behaviour. We left and she gave us the rude finger as we left.
review 4:
Nusa Penida was the highlight of our Bali trip. This accommodation was perfect for us, it was close to the ports (arriving, leaving, snorkel trip, etc.) and also lots of amazing cafes and restaurants but was very secluded and quiet. Waking up and watching the sunrise from the balcony and listening to the waves while we slept was the ultimate relaxation for us. The room was clean and lovely, the bathroom is a bit tired but completely fine for us.
The lady was very helpful and the staff lovely.
review 5: Loved loved looooved our stay here. Location is perfect. Directly next to the water, we were jumping from our terrasse directly into the water. Next to a supermarket and a really good restaurant. 100% the best stay we had in our whole Bali trip.

name: Timbul Jaya Snorkeling
address: Ped, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
If you want to watch mantarays we definitely need to hire this guys!

Beautiful spot, we saw lots of mantarays, fish and coral and awesome attention.

Highly recommended.
review 2: Loved it! We did private tour (2ppl) and we really enjoyed it. Captain and tour guide were really nice and they also took a lot of great pictures and videos. Thank you for great experience.
review 3: I've seen the ratings before but give it a try. They know there are big waves so you won't be able to see rays. They take you anyway and pretend like they don't know. The last spot in front of the departure is the best part of it so just rent the equipment üòÇ too many boat and the departure is 9h30. You should choose company leaving at 6am maybe you'll have more chance to see it.
review 4:
Very bad place. They promise to bring you to Manta Bay for snorkeling. And they bring you to Crystal Bay for snorkeling. They deceive tourists.

As we understand, the low season for snorkeling on Nusa Penida is from September to May. At this time, In Manta Bay are hit by very large waves and it is very dangerous to go there. At this time they promise to bring you to Manta Bay, but on the way they pretend to be surprised that the waves are big and you can‚Äôt swim there. And they go to Crystal Bay.

If you do not want to snorkel at Crystal Bay, your money will not be returned. We didn't get our money back and didnt snokeling because we wanted to snorkeling only in Manta Bay and see manta ray.

If you come to this place, refuse the excursion and return the money. Do not use the services of this company. SKAM
review 5: Absolutley not recomended, we where told we would be 3-3:30h snorkeling at 4 different manta points and we just went to 1 manta place and 2 coral places (1 of them just in front of the beach)

name: La Plage Apartments Nusa Penida
address: Ped, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Quiet and cozy place right on the first line near the ocean.
Private beach.
Beautiful interior, dishes and details. Comfortable large bed and a gorgeous view from the window.
There is a sushi restaurant right across the street.
Beautiful friendly hostess. I'm delighted! This is my best vacation! Thank you!
review 2: An absolute sincere recommendation, the accommodation was large, very nicely furnished and the location was perfect for us! There are stairs leading directly to the beach and one of the two bedrooms has a sea view. The other room faces the street, which can be a bit noisy in the evening or early in the morning, but we still slept very well! The bedrooms are both equipped with air conditioning and the breakfast was also very tasty. We were within walking distance of our diving school and could make great excursions from there. The owner was very friendly, accommodating and communication was easy. On the day of our departure, she spontaneously arranged a taxi for us! We were very lucky to find this lovely accommodation.
review 3:
Wonderful apartment that I can imagine of.
The sea view makes me feel relaxed.
Would definitely come back, not only the host is friendly but also the whole apartment is beautiful.
review 4: Great experience, such a beautiful place , right in front of the beach, perfect location , I totally recommend this place
review 5: Stunningly beautiful location with super kind and hospitable staff. Highly, highly recommend.

name: d‚Äô Nusa Beach Club and Resto, Nusa Penida
address: Jalan Raya Ped, Desa Kelurahan Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida Kab. Klungkung, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Bali, 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
I think it‚Äôs the best beach place in the area. It offers everything - huge, cold and clean swimming pool. Very comfortable sunbeds on sand. Access to the beach / sea.
Food is great, music super chill, staff friendly. It‚Äôs a great relaxing place.
Service could be more attentive :)
review 2:
Very beautiful Beachclub & Resto! We loved the service and personal attention. Great food and a stunning pool! We will come back here! üòä
Grtz Jules & Nikol
review 3: We had a very relaxing afternoon at d'Nusa. Very friendly, helpful staff, wonderful view and pool facilities. Special mention for the delicious food we had while there. We order the Pork Belly and Chicken Betutu and both where delicious!
review 4: Great food, great drinks- pools a little sandy but expected. The 20% opening special was nice
review 5: Best beach club in Nusa Penida! Great facilities, food and vibe. Highly recommend.
